name: SteamWars 2069
description:
Stay still to shoot!

Move with the WASD keys to avoid enemy fire!

You have 2 minutes to defeat wave after wave of enemies and upgrade your arsenal along the way!

Credits:

Destin Ameer Johnson (Project Manager)

Dante Plummer (Sound and Music Design)

Zakee Smith (Level Design)

Marc Wegner (Art Design)

Brandon Valles (Lead Programmer)
